page.title: 04The Welbeck Estate Workforce
page.content:
At present the Welbeck Estates Co. employs a 28 strong workforce to fell timber. They consist of
Workers 22 Students (Agricultural) 3 Foresters 1 Foresters Assistant 1 Secretaries 1
The timber felling is rotated from one plantation to the next so there is always work to do. The timber is not felled very often if new trees are being planted due to the lack of sufficient workmen. There used to be many people who worked on the estate when it was run by the Dukes of Portland but many people have moved to local towns to work in better paid jobs.
